field.comment: Process definitions are versioned, the processId connects all versions
field.name: processDefinitionId

field.comment: You can define a shared queue. Otherwise each process will have its own (anonymous) queue.
field.name: queue

field.comment: When was this version released to be active? Only one version of a process should be active
field.name: released

field.comment: When was it deprecated in favor of a newer version?
field.name: deprecated
